# titleHighlightRanges

**Instance Property**

The ranges of characters to highlight in the title string.

## Declaration

```swift
var titleHighlightRanges: [NSValue] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains an array of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSValue] objects, each of which contains an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSRange-c.struct] type defining a range of characters in the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKLocalSearchCompletion/title] string. Use this property to identify the ranges of characters in the title string that you want to highlight. Highlighting the matching text of a search completion is optional, but it’s a best practice for providing helpful information to the user.

## Getting the search completions

- **title**: The title string associated with the point of interest.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle (if any) associated with the point of interest.
- **subtitleHighlightRanges**: The ranges of characters to highlight in the subtitle string.
